result.text: In September, China's #vehicle exports increased 38.7% year-on-year, with export value increasing by 45.1%. Pure electric vehicles, passenger cars, buses and trucks ranked the top four in export volume. In the first three quarters, vehicle export volume surged 64.1% year-on-year, while export value surged 83.7%, according to statistics released by the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers on Wednesday.

legacy.full_text:
RT @EbrahimHashem: Those who deliberately spread lies about Xinjiang and its Muslim population are just shameless liars.

They try to use X…

legacy.description: Emirati on a journey of becoming; lived in China, the US & Europe; his life is dedicated to preparing a nation for the next 100 years. (Tweets in 4 languages)
legacy.name: Ebrahim Hashem 李思瑞 إبراهيم هاشم

result.text:
Those who deliberately spread lies about Xinjiang and its Muslim population are just shameless liars.

They try to use Xinjiang’s majestic diversity to internally destabilise China and externally create a rift between the Muslim world and China.

Now that I have spent more than 20 days in Xinjiang, I can say with complete confidence that the Western narrative about Xinjiang is just that: a lie.  

I believe China’s rise won’t be stopped by some insecure hegemonists who have been discredited domestically and internationally.  

The hegemonists’ delusion to brutally and rapaciously dominate the world is now on full display for the entire world to see, especially in Palestine, Ukraine and Taiwan.

The hegemonists’ sense of insecurity about their place in the world is making them reveal their true nature, their predatory behaviour, their brazen hypocrisy, their extreme incompetence and their ugly immorality.

Whether the hegemonists like it or not, the world is inevitably moving into a new order, simply because most of the world badly wants it.

Note:
The video clip here was spontaneously taken by somebody who seemed to be a Muslim from Xinjiang. We both happened to be buying Halal food from a Muslim Uighur restaurant in Ürümqi, Xinjiang’s capital city.

legacy.full_text:

They try to use Xinjiang’s majestic diversity to internally destabilise China and externally create a rift between the Muslim world and China.

result.text: The draft resolution presented by Jordan on behalf of the Arab countries at the emergency special session of the UN General Assembly has been adopted with a high number of votes, reflecting the strong call from the international community, especially the Arab and Islamic countries, for a cease-fire. As a co-sponsor of the resolution, China highly appreciates and supports Jordan's important and special role at this critical moment, said Zhai Jun, special envoy of the Chinese government on the Middle East issue, in a meeting with Jordanian Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Ayman Safadi, on Monday in Jordan.

legacy.full_text: #CIIECountdown #InNumbers The China International Import Expo (#CIIE) 2023 will be held from Nov 5-10 in Shanghai. The exhibition area of the expo will be around 367,000 sqm². Area of China Pavilion this time will be expanded to 2,500 sqm², the largest in the history of CIIE. https://t.co/HqPAG7riJ9

حدود ۴۰۰ تاجر ایرانی در نمایشگاه بین‌المللی واردات چین - شانگهای (#CIIE) شرکت خواهند کرد و مساحت نمایشگاه کشور ایران به ۲۰۰۰ متر مربع می رسد که بزرگترین نمایشگاه ایران در تاریخ CIIE خواهد بود. معتقدم محصولات ایرانی مورد استقبال مصرف کنندگان چینی قرار خواهد گرفت.
